plugin.title: HD Plugin
plugin.author: LongTail Video
plugin.description: This plugin implements an HD quality toggle in the controlbar. An icon is shown to do the toggle, and the value is saved as a cookie. This plugin works for single files and playlists (in the latter case, a new playlist is loaded).

flashvar.name: file
flashvar.description: Location of the HD video the player should load. The regular 'file' flashvar holds the location of the fallback video.
